product_name: Oakley Wiretap Polarized Sunglasses - Carbon Frame - Men's
long_description: Inspired by vintage bombers and classic race cars, the Oakley Wiretap Polarized Sunglasses with a streamlined carbon-color frame offer a fresh new look for semi-rimless sun protection. Constructed of a lightweight, durable aluminum alloy. Semi-rimless wire frame with integrated spring hinges. Polarized polycarbonate lenses cut glare, resist impact damage and block 100% of harmful UV rays. Modified-wraparound 8-base lens curvature optimizes peripheral vision. Oakley Wiretap Polarized Sunglasses include a Microclear(TM) bag for frame storage and lens cleaning.
short_description: Inspired by vintage bombers and classic race cars, the Oakley Wiretap Polarized Sunglasses with a streamlined carbon-color frame offer a fresh new look for semi-rimless sun protection.
